resumen: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help. When a spell goes wrong, dangerous foes from other worlds start to appear, forcing Peter to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.
sinopsis: Peter Parker's secret identity as Spider-Man is revealed to the world. Seeking help from Doctor Strange, Peter inadvertently opens the multiverse, bringing threats from alternate realities.

resumen: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
sinopsis: The Avengers unite once more to undo the destruction caused by Thanos in a final showdown.
elenco: Robert Downey Jr., Chris Evans, Mark Ruffalo
